name: Crablocks
description: Olly and her pal Cinch are the caretaker of Sunset Beach! When the sun goes down, they get to work, cleaning up blocks that are carried by the water and then recycling it in this action-packed one or two player puzzle game! Olly must grab all the blocks and toss them to the side for Cinch to recycle! How long can you keep the beach clean?
